Text:
Confirm!
Files are really updating the game properly!
Aim fix is there!
BE AWARE that there is new ini file 3DMGame.ini which contains PlayerName = "3DMGAME" and will make ur save games non valid!

For saves to work :
- change in 3DMGame.ini PlayerName with yours
- play the game until first save
- copy and overwrite data0 from "AppDataLocalFLTSteam222480remote" to "AppDataLocalSKIDROW222480Storage"
